entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 except minus 21 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14 except minus 21 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
